website_summaries.verdict: A compact, highly portable model that runs at 1,600 watts. Perfect for light use or emergency situations that require only powering the bare minimum of devices.
pros: Three running modes allow for fuel conservation and quieter operating
Starting doesn't require a great deal of strength
The fuel level and runtime indicator are quite handy
cons: Product name is slightly misleading because it only provides 1,600 running watts

customer_reviews.title: Best generator in its class
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best generator I've had in its category. I just went through hurricane Irma and it ran everything I needed to (minus AC). Ran TV, 4 box fans, large refrigerator, a few lamps and wireless router in addition to phone chargers etc. I was out of power for 3 days and ran it constant on 7 gallons of fuel. I never exceeded 40% capacity. Would strongly recommend this to anyone needing a backup generator for the home or camping. Super quiet compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: myles thomas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this junk.  HORRIBLE Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Product has a metal eyelet that guides the pull rope inside the unit. It gets hot, and burns the pull cord. I have had mine replaced twice. Upon contacting Generac, they will not fix or replace because they say I am pulling the cord wrong. I am very careful to pull the cord only straight up, ESPECIALLY after having to pay Northern Tool to replace the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rogerson

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two to run in tandem for our BBQ Trailer. We had trouble starting one out of the box and had to go to take it to a mechanic but once it started, it was good. They performed as expected and I like that you can tell how many hours are left by the display. It was a very good purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great run time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two units with the intent to run in parallel. Once we finally got two working units all is well. They are quiet, great run time, and power just as advertised. There was a 50% success rate with them arriving fully functional. The first did not have a functioning gas gauge, but otherwise functioned. The replacement when started sent gas everywhere inside the case. It was not evident where it was coming from, but continued leaking until all the gas in the unit leaked out. The disappointment was how Generac responded with the issues on two brand new generators. They informed us to take them to a repair shop, which quoted multi weeks repair times. Amazon made everything right though.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had to use this a few times but it started up each time after a few pulls. I used to power my 3 door refrigerator/freezer and my complete home theater system (60” tv, Dvr, receiver, and five speakers. It worked as advertised. Also powered a coffee maker and toaster oven when needed. Charged iPhone, iPad too.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus Glas

customer_reviews.title: BAD DEAL TO GET THE SQUARE TRADER EXTENDED INSURANCE NO ONE TO ANSWER THE CALL.
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE NOTE THIS INVERTER GENERATOR IS A VERY USEFUL HELP IN EMERGENCY LOOK UP YOU TUBE GENERAC THIS REVIEW IS FOR THE COMPANY SQUARE TRADER DO NOT, DO NOT ,DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT TO EXTEND ANYTHING YOU SHOULD NOT GET INSURANCE FROM SQUARE TRADER YOU WILL GET THE THE RUN AROUND FROM THIS COMPANY GET THE 877 NUMBER FROM AMAZON. A WASTE OF YOUR MONEY.THERE IS NO LIVE CUSTOMER SERVICE TO ANSWER THE PHONE DO NOT GET THE SQUARE TRADER INSURANCE..
customer_reviews.author: michael Labadie

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This item failed to function on the very first use. Unboxed, installed per instructions, and would not allow both generators to load. This resulted in not enough power to run an A/C unit and tripped every time. To make sure it was not the A/C, I ran it on a larger single generator and it ran fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Licenzi

customer_reviews.title: DOA right out of box, poor quality control, buy a Honda instead!
customer_reviews.text: DOA upon arrival, seller said take to repair center. I don't think a brand new generator out of the box should immediately go to repair center. Seller emails all started with " We're sorry to hear that" , that was a bad sign. Sent it back. I did get refund and I bought a Honda ! My recommendation: bite the bullet, pay once , cry once and buy a Honda. I do not recommend Generac at all...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massively disappointed and now turning into a huge hassle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this generator about 8 months ago. I started it and made sure it ran, then stored it for emergency use. A contractor came over and we needed to use it for some tools. He cant even run his chop saw off of it. The generator cant load- the meter doesnt even go up. The thing is a dud and now I dont know how to get one that works because its been so long. Massively disappointed and now turning into a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: lazarus790

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two IQ2000 generators. They arrived on time with one small flaw. The fuel hose wasn't attached to the fuel tanks allowing all the fuel I put into the tanks to run out onto the ground, which is a major safety concern. The generators have been in the shop for warrantee repair ever since. I will let you know how they work after I get them back.
customer_reviews.author: K Muller

customer_reviews.title: Took delivery and went through the instructions, added fluids ...
customer_reviews.text: Took delivery and went through the instructions, added fluids, started it up and was surprised at how quiet it was. No leaks as mentioned in some of the reviews but the fuel gauge and the estimated time to empty clock do not work. I have initiated a return for replacement with Amazon and will see how things go with the next one. I did run it for a full night to charge some batteries, cell phones and run a CPAP and it used very little fuel. I hope the replacement I receive is fully functional so I can keep on using it for our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jim3579

customer_reviews.title: The best i own!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent generator works great low noise levels. i like it he has everything you need to, all gauges in front to track your fuel and power consumption. Got a nice test last weekend we had a very nice storm here in Washington State. I got two now i highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: C M Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Powerful unit. Starts easily, runs quietly. Be sure to have on boost level to start AC otherwise it is not powerful enough on economy level. Used at park on Lake Ontario and with lake sounds I could not hear the unit when running. It is not feather weight but not too much to handle. I am 68.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D. Ferry

customer_reviews.title: Great generator!!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition! Used it the weekend after I got it. Very easy to use, I love the three settings and the readout about how many hours are left. It was very quiet, comparable to the Honda. I would highly recommend this to my family/friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a few weeks and used it three times. It works well so far, is quiet, and starts on the first pull. One caveat: we have a 1100 watt microwave and the microwave's power is noticeably reduced when using this generator which is ratted for 2200 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W.

customer_reviews.title: Works on both generators but had to make a 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works on both generators but had to make a 30 amp pigtail for it otherwise i could get only the 15 amp plug that fit the kit now can use the 30 amps that both put out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It starts great. But out of the box it runs rich
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run my truck camper when I am in the wilderness. It starts great. But out of the box it runs rich. The exhaust smells rich and the engine sputters like the choke is still on a little. I am going to take it to my local small engine repair shop for a tune up. It does handle all my camper needs. AC, refrigerator, and lights. Not too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: billdozer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing worse than this generator is their 1 800 phone support.
customer_reviews.text: I got it and ran it for a while at home and it ran great. Took my family camping and as soon as we plugged it into the trailer the generator hit the rev limiter and shorted out. As the sun set and it started getting cold I called the 1800 number and requested a call back. That was several months ago and I still have not heard from them. Fortunately our campsite neighbors had a Honda and they let us charge our battery's during the day. I called them again today and have been on hold for over ten minutes. I will update if I ever get to talk to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Worked it hard this past week while in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Worked it hard this past week while in Princeville, NC performing disaster recovery efforts. Princeville, due to Hurricane Matthew flooding, had no electric power available at any of the houses. Generator supplied all power to lights, power tools and ShockWave fogging machines. Features including gasoline tank level, power load, and time left at current load were ideal. Easy to start and run. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene J. Zukosky

customer_reviews.title: Can you say China?
customer_reviews.text: Ran once fine. Next time no fuel or hour display. Service sucks. Some dummy stole it from me and I wasn’t too upset. Bought a Honda. There’s no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: frederick kotila

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, started easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, started easily. Many very nice features. Not as quiet as led to believe - my sound meter indicates closer to 58 dB.
customer_reviews.author: Gearloose

customer_reviews.title: Will not do what the day when paralleled together.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and the parallel box to run them together. Don’t do it. They never work properly. One loses ground the other then overloads and everything shuts off. I would not recommend if you are needing two tor run together. Get the Honda’s.
customer_reviews.author: Pblaz001

customer_reviews.title: Died after third use, just a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Unit malfunction after third use, total junk. I took it into the repair center and they told me it would cost more to fix than it was worth. I lost $800 on this piece of junk. Sticking with Honda.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand than generac.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work. Generators would not work in parallel and one keep shutting into overload protection. Buy another brand than generac. They do not put out what they claim in watts and ganging two together did little to help.
customer_reviews.author: Ross T.

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet! Plugged to my house and it worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet! Plugged to my house and it worked excellent. Powered my fridge, fans and illumination with no problems. Got the opportunity to compare it side by side with the Honda and it clearly was quieter at the same load. Beats Honda, period. Also, it uses very little fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando L Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for power outages haven't had any yet but I start it once a month and it starts quickly and runs smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Buy American with quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent generator! Well built and as quiet as Honda with more features like the fuel remaining gauge and power output gauge, which are very nice! Plus, I like the fact that it's an American company!
customer_reviews.author: Fishngame

customer_reviews.title: Good for the 2200i as well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knowing that it wasn’t made for the model (2200i) that I own. I couldn’t find a cover for my model. I was pleased to find that it fits well and will do the job. The window gaps don’t exactly align, but they will fit and are functional.
customer_reviews.author: HDLikeMe

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It was expensive (around $700 when I purchased it) but is reliable and fairly quiet (like noise machine level from inside your camper). It is reliable and paired with a second one can power the lights, a/c, and music on a 35 ft toy hauler.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up and provides enough power to run the refrigerator on my boat and the microwave too. Fits perfectly in the space I have in so it's out of the way but accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: The best generator I've EVER used
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, reliable, can parallel with other generators, and overall beautiful build quality. This unit runs laps around Hondas!
customer_reviews.author: RocketScience

customer_reviews.title: Generator didn’t work after a few seconds, completely dead.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like the item but it wouldn’t stay on. It worked for a few seconds and the motor continued to die out. We followed the instructions and how-to videos but it seems all options didn’t work. After reading some troubleshooting instructions online I found other people experienced the same issue, I wish I read some negative reviews prior to my purchase. Thankfully I was still able to return the item
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. It has never worked properly Super hard to start and was living off the grid so really needed it. Once started it worked good IF you could get is started. When calling customer service was given the runaround and told we needed to bring it to one of there service people and would not let us return it. We did and our still having problems. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Don't spend you money on this unit!! First unit ran fine, until I got to 2600ft elevation, then surged under 20-40% load, sometimes shutting down. Then at about 20hrs, the starting rope started to come apart! Received a warranty replacement unit from Generac, the replacement unit ran fine, until it was stored for a couple of months, now there is no spark!!! Spend a little more $$ and buy Yamaha or Honda in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a dream and quite and good on gas I ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs like a dream and quite and good on gas I purchase two and the kit to run two at a time' I made a duel 6 gal fuel extender I was able to get a special made gas cap for it hooked to outboard motor gas tank now ready for bad weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money on anything else
customer_reviews.text: The generac iq2000 is the best inverter generator you will ever own. It is SUPER quiet. I bought it for two reasons bowfishing and for when a hurricane comes. I've used it a couple of times bowfishing already. You can barely hear it while bowfishing. I have 14 lights on my bowfishing rig and it only uses 40% of the power. I know for sure when a hurricane comes and I lose power this inverter generator will be very handy.
customer_reviews.author: DuckHunter

customer_reviews.title: Junk, enough said.
customer_reviews.text: Huge mistake buying this.... Delivered on 8/22, put two hours on it over the first two weeks (ran perfect), I go to start it today (9/27) and will not run as it did. I go to return it and it's past 30 days, return window closed on 9/22. Unbelievable. Now stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Leak gas and oil
customer_reviews.text: Got this generator brand new directly from generac company. Filled with fuel, and oil. Started it and fuel started pouring out of the pink line coming out of the carburetor. Im not happy with that
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Did not start right out of the box even after adding the oil and gas. And after going over all of the Directions. Not good 🙁😡
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hearon

customer_reviews.title: Has a "smart throttle" feature which is supposed to conserve ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a "smart throttle" feature which is supposed to conserve fuel, but ends up making the machine bog down and trip the overload when you actually put a high load on it (well within the max and sustained ratings)... Bothersome since I use it for field work where I need portable power at times.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A marvelous waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 DOA. First leaked fuel and the second one emitted white smoke before failing. Consider buying this if your time is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: kristopolous

customer_reviews.title: Will not run
customer_reviews.text: Will not start at all I am not happy with the purchase and would not recommend now I find myself jumping through hoops
customer_reviews.author: Rob Quartermain

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY... PLZ
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these generators and now both are acting up. not able to support power like other (Honda) Generators. The saying "you get what you pay for it" it is cheap so don't expect much out of this. I would not buy Generac again, will go back to Honda and Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do DO NOT BUY THIS GENERAC. The first one leaked fuel right out of the box. The second leaked fuel right out of the box and the third one will not start. Do your self a favor and buy a Honda
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great performer for two seasons of dry camping at the high elevation lakes in Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Generac portable generator cover.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and protects my portable generator Generac 22000i that sits in the engine compartment of my boat from salt water in the bilge that splashes around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Maniet

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work out of box. Called Generac and they told me to take it in for warranty work . Products been at warranty shop for almost 2 months. I would go with the Predator from Harbor Freight if I had it to do over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jbh11

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is great little generator. I did an extensive test on this generator right out of the box and it easily powered all of the devices I will use in a power outage, granted not at the same time but that was never going to happen with a generator of this size. It is very quiet even when under a full load, which was very important to me living close to other people. I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm can't stress enough how much you need to not buy these things. I have two of these, one bought locally. They both leaked gas badly right out of the box, then they went down again with carburetor issues. Both times in the shop literally took months due parts being backordered. If you still decide you can't live without a couple, I'll be happy to unload mine on you. :(
customer_reviews.author: Notso

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: When I paired it with another iQ2000 they fail to even have enough power to run the AC on my RV. I spent twice as much on the pair of these than I would have on a much cheaper Predator. Really regretting buy these now, now I'm left trying to sell them slightly used to get enough money to buy a single larger generator. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: My Pal Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and good Smart panel
customer_reviews.text: Quieter then expected. Works as advertised. Also have a honda. Either would be a good score. I do like the smart panel better on the Generac. Tells how much power being used and how many hours left before refueling is needed.
customer_reviews.author: James Carroll

customer_reviews.title: mobile power with discreet features
customer_reviews.text: easily placed in discreet location and very quiet. runs the essential items for power outage, and very convenient for tail-gates and car camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and protection for my generators.  Simple and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Ir fits the generator, keeps it dry and has a slot in the top middle for carrying your unit without taking the cover completely off.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet I bought this for a friend in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet I bought this for a friend in the Virgin Island after the two cat 5 hurricanes and it was a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this one, I got a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great price and value! Will be using this for camping. My neighbor's will like the minimal noise. I compared this to a Honda EM650 and it's actually quieter.
customer_reviews.author: 1hapiflip

customer_reviews.title: 1 picture not always worth a thousand words
customer_reviews.text: Once I got one that wasn't defective it works fine, picture instructions aren't real clear ;-( but a quick read of the printed ones make it a snap
customer_reviews.author: Craig H

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: One tip, if you are running a high load you will need to switch to max speed first then drop down to economy or else the generator will shutdown. Other than that this is one of the quietest generators I have ever used. Very easy to use and very light. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Fuel Leak on first start.
customer_reviews.text: Got this generator brand new. Filled with fuel, and oil. Started it and fuel started pouring out of the pink line coming out of the carburetor. Not happy at all with this and will be returning or maybe exchanging if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Quality was what I would expect from Generac. This fit our 2200 Generac fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected...
customer_reviews.text: This cover feels like it is made from quality material and fits very well. It has an elastic gusset opening on its bottom which snugly fits around the generator. I would recommend this to others...
customer_reviews.author: ChuckleHead

customer_reviews.title: Quiet power
customer_reviews.text: Ask me in a year if it is as good as a Honda. Right now it is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: mogotcha

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Kicks over but will not run. I've had better luck with Chinese knockoff brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: easy to start
customer_reviews.text: First one I received would not run smooth, and Amazon quickly replaced it, and took the defective one back. This is just what I was looking for, easy to start, runs quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim White

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the savings over Honda gen
customer_reviews.text: It broke down after only one weeks worth of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: works great for connecting 2 IQ2000's to deliver 4000 peak watts
customer_reviews.author: gahunter

customer_reviews.title: Did not last poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked 1 month after warranty out a total of 30 hours use in 25 months. I will be purchasing a Honda replacement. Big money spent very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sally gossett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Generator Overall...
customer_reviews.text: Nice generator overall - quiet, light, easy to carry, and the power ramps up when the demand exists. I knock one star off due to the lack of an engine hour meter for maintenance; why not include it on the "Smart LED Dashboard"? Gah... I ended up getting anand hooked it up. Note that I had to pull the shielding away from the spark plug wire for it to work properly. I only ran it briefly and will amend if warranted.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says !
customer_reviews.text: I got this just to have it for a emergency backup. I've used it a few times just to put it thru its paces and it works like a charm. It truly lives up to the advertisements. No complaints at all !
customer_reviews.author: Wil Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Boooooooo.. Generac is NOT as good as a Honda
customer_reviews.text: It ran one time, it stopped... and it’s been in the shop the whole time. Generac customer service is not good. Honestly I should have bought the Honda. I’ve owned that one before. It costs more, but it RAN when I needed it too. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Generac generator cover
customer_reviews.text: Pretty costly. You could buy one from a different that would fit and keep the dust off just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dale T. Sirkle

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Love it better than a Honda 2000. I have both
customer_reviews.author: David M. Buelle

customer_reviews.title: I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the competition. So quiet, so powerful. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Carson

customer_reviews.title: Long fuel tank life.
customer_reviews.text: Fuel last for long time at half load. Can run a fridge and tv at same time. Can not run portable heaters that well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: generac review
customer_reviews.text: Love our new Generac , we were saving for a Honda when a friend told me about Generac . We were not disappointed. Quiet, easy start , easy to handle . would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Winner over Honda, Yamaha, and Champion —-Generac!
customer_reviews.text: Generac lived up to its name. Other than overfilling the oil (as the funnel screws on and I got tired of adding a little then checking), after cleaning a bit, gas in, it started the first pull. It is QUIET! On low power it is a whisper. I borrowed a older Coleman 2000watt during our power outage after Irma and it drove us nuts inside the house. It is almost half the weight of the Coleman and has clean power. I would stack it up against the Honda any day plus this is made in Wisconsin, USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I wanted, it will not work with a RV 30 amp plug.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: When it works it is quieter then honda.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 weeks and it worked great. Then it just quit. The motor would start but it wouldn't generate power. So I returned it through amazon which was a good experience. Then I bought a Honda. Advertisements are right it is quieter. But I need something the works every time I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley VanScoy

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that i know of that would improve this product is for it to have a 12V battery charging kit with it that would plug straight in to the genaraotor. Other than that this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Everett D. Gaedchens

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 years ago for my son who lives in the Virgin islands, didnt open it till this week when Dorian hit. Wont start, no customer support.
customer_reviews.author: David Kjaer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs great but problems with the fuel line separating from the tank over and over
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my gen sets I haul in my truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but I am not sure that my camper ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but I am not sure that my camper is getting the correct ground, My surge protector says open ground.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Yencer

customer_reviews.title: Limited Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Generator, poor warranty. I had this generator for little over month. The pull string broke on its 2nd use. It has a 2 year limited warranty but what that means is, it covers parts but not the labor to have it repaired. So now I have to pay the repair shop to have this fairly new generator .repaired.
customer_reviews.author: John Paschalis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, purchased because I already had one and needed 2
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this generator has visible gauges. It is also much quieter than the competition and very easy starting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles terry

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed inverter generator at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very well-designed inverter generator. Have used it already to power my weed blower and it ran fine. You need to read the directions before use as it has some unusual features, e.g. you need to turn a switch on the gas cap to "open" before starting and to "close" when done running the generator. Bought it mainly to use to run our highly computerized refrigerator when we have our inevitable winter power outages. Inverter style generator is supposed to be more compatible with computerized products, puts out a more even power flow. Pretty easy to carry around, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work and I had to pay shipping to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This generator works perfect for my job as an electrician..
customer_reviews.author: ROMEO POP

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: NICE little package , well thought out , just recieved mine yesterday , added oil, gas , ONE pull and it started right up ! VERY quiet , even under load i was impressed .. didn't give it 5 stars because none of my gages worked when it got here , i had to undo the front panel and connect the wires myself after calling they're customer service, that's annoying ..HOPE they're quality control is better than that on the parts that matter ...only time will tell how sturdy these are really , its only been released for 5 months now....so far tho i am impressed .... wasn't about to pay 1K for the Honda A friend has one.

product_meta.title: Generac 6866 iQ2000 Super Quiet 1600 Running Watts/2000 Starting Watts Gas Powered Inverter Generator - CARB Compliant
product_meta.description: Style:iQ2000Generac’s iQ2000 is the ideal generator for powering your desired loads in a variety of outdoor environments, including parks, campsites, backyard parties and tailgating events. Third-party testing has proven the iQ2000 to be quieter than its competitors*, which allows users to provide power to their desired loads without disturbing those around them. The generator can be connected to a variety of sensitive appliances, including electronics, as its digital inverter module converts the raw power it produces from DC to AC power. Best of all, the iQ2000 is easy to use and boasts innovative features not found on any other inverter generator in the industry. While the unit’s Start, Run and Stop functions can be manually set via the iQ2000’s PowerDial, users can toggle between Turbo, Standard and Economy modes through the use of a simple switch to reduce noise and fuel consumption rates based on load requirements. When items requiring higher power outputs are connected to the generator, Turbo mode should be utilized. For loads requiring minimal power output, switching to Economy mode is recommended; Standard mode should be utilized for all intermediate load requirements. To accommodate larger load requirements, the iQ2000 is also parallel capable. Users can nearly double the power output available to their desired loads by connecting two generators through the use of an optional Parallel Kit. In regards to product feedback, the unit’s dashboard bestows LED displays that can be utilized to continuously monitor the generator’s operating status. While the unit is running, users can verify how much time they have left before refueling is required by referring to the run-time remaining display, and the PowerBar constantly specifies wattage produced by the generator at all times. Other innovative status indicators include low fuel, low oil, overload and overheating alerts. *Based on independent lab tests using ISO 9614 to measure sound power levels vs. Honda EU2000i. Fuel Type: Gasoline
feature_bullets: AC Rated Output(Running/Starting): 1600/2000 Watts; AC Rated Voltage: 120V
PowerDial integrates start/run/stop functions into 1 easy-to-use dial
PowerBar monitors and displays wattage used; Electronic Fuel Gauge displays remaining fuel; Runtime Display show how much time is left before refueling
Fuel Capacity: 1.06 Gallons; Runtime (50% - 25% Load): 5.7 - 7.7 hrs; Full Load Fuel Consumption (gallons/hour): 2.85; Displacement: 80 cc; Oil Type: SAE 10W-30
Economy, Standard, and Turbo modes of operation saves fuel and reduces noise
Parallel 2 units together for twice the power (parallel kit model 6877 sold separately); Storage Cover model 6875 sold separately
